title: "vscodeaddins"
output: github_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Brings VS Code commands to RStudio via Addins. Currently only "Transform to Uppercase" and "Trim Trailing Whitespace" are implemented, in future will add 

* Transform to lowercase
* Add selection to next find match (i.e. Ctrl+D)
